titleStmt.title: Observations on a pamphlet touching the present condition of the navy and victualling with some particular remarks on the author and on what he writes touching Q's and R's / by a well-wisher to the Royal Navy of England.
titleStmt.author: Well-wisher to the Royal Navy of England.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed and sold by J. Nutt,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
With: Remarks upon the navy, the second part / a sailor. London : [s.n.], printed in the year 1700.
